column3: Does it make the `ci/test/04_install.sh` Cirrus-specific? What if we will be forced to migrate from it?

> Does it make the `ci/test/04_install.sh` Cirrus-specific? What if we will be forced to migrate from it?\n\nIt shouldn't. The scripts still work locally and inside docker, also on third party hardware.
Closing because it works, but there is no pressing need to change this right now.
